title: Exports to China have increased threefold, says Lankan envoy
content: Sri Lankan Ambassador to China Karunatilaka Amunugama (Photo: China.org.cn) Sri Lanka was one of the first countries to recognize the newly-founded People’s Republic of China, and establish an embassy in Beijing, affirmed the Sri Lankan Ambassador to China, Karunatilaka Amunugama.
